name: Amazon Cloud Directory
short: A scalable and flexible high-performance directory service on AWS for organizing hierarchical data.
description: Amazon Cloud Directory is a scalable, high-performance, multi-tenant directory service. It allows for organizing hierarchal data across multiple dimensions for flexible cloud-native directories. Cloud Directory's schemas, fully managed scaling, and automatic backups make it a secure and reliable solution for application directories, device registries, or organizational charts. With support for multiple hierarchies and extensible schemas, it facilitates the development of versatile applications without infrastructure management.
